DOC.brief_summary: This study compare effect internal versus external focus attention motor training affect arm individual stroke . Participants randomly assign either internal external focus treatment group receive 12 session arm training .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Attentional Focus Arm Training Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomize one two treatment group receive upper arm reach train InMotion 2 shoulder robot ( 12 hourly session four week ) . The external focus group receive instruction specifically pay attention task goal -- hit target video game , internal focus group instruct pay attention movement arm motion ( video game monitor turn ) . Both group practice arm reach pattern match level arm impairment training dosage .
